welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bafra, Turkey! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's stunning coastal views, historical landmarks, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that Bafra has to offer.

restaurants.address: İsmetpaşa Mah.  Mehmet Akif Ersoy No:22, Bafra
